00008 Task1::Task1( uint32_t magic, const ::Multiboot_Info* mbi )
00009                 : Application(), magic( magic ), mbi( reinterpret_cast<const Multiboot_Info*>( mbi ) )

00015 bool Task1::checkFlag( Flags flag )
00016 {
00017         return ( mbi->flags&flag );
00018 }

00020 
00021 void Task1::parseAndPrint()
00022 {
00023 
00024         if ( magic != MULTIBOOT_BOOTLOADER_MAGIC ) {
00025                 kout << "Not booted by multiboot compliant loader" << endl;
00026                 return;
00027         }
00028 
00029         kout << "flags= " << bin << mbi->flags << dec << endl;
00030 
00031         if ( checkFlag( memSize ) )
00032                 kout << "mem_lower = " << mbi->mem_lower
00033                 << "KB, mem_upper = " << mbi->mem_upper
00034                 << "KB" << endl;
00035 
00036         if ( checkFlag( bootDev ) )
00037                 kout << "boot_device = " << hex << mbi->boot_device << endl;
00038 
00039         if ( checkFlag( cmdLine ) )
00040                 kout << "cmdline = " << ( const char* )mbi->cmdline << endl;
00041 
00042         if ( checkFlag( modules ) ) {
00043                 kout << "mods_count = " << dec << mbi->mods_count
00044                 << ", mods_addr = " << hex << mbi->mods_addr << endl;
00045 
00046                 Module *mod = reinterpret_cast<Module*>( mbi->mods_addr );
00047                 for ( uint32_t i = 0;i < mbi->mods_count; i++ ) {
00048                         kout << " mod_start = " << mod->mod_start
00049                         << ", mod_end = " << mod->mod_end
00050                         << ", string = " << mod->string << endl;
00051                         mod++;
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 
00055         if ( checkFlag( aOut ) && checkFlag( elf ) ) {
00056                 kout << "Both bits 4 and 5 are set." << endl;
00057                 return;
00058         }
00059 
00060         if ( checkFlag( aOut ) ) {
00061                 const AOut_Symbol_Table *aout_sym = &( mbi->executable_info.aout );
00062 
00063                 kout << "aout_symbol_table: tabsize = "
00064                 << dec << aout_sym->tabsize << endl
00065                 << "strsize = " << aout_sym->strsize
00066                 << ", addr = " << hex << aout_sym->addr << endl;
00067         }
00068 
00069         if ( checkFlag( elf ) ) {
00070                 const ELF_Section_Header_Table *elf_sec = &( mbi->executable_info.elf );
00071 
00072                 kout << "elf_sec: num = " << dec << elf_sec->num
00073                 << ", size = " << elf_sec->size << endl
00074                 << " addr = " << hex << elf_sec->addr
00075                 << ", shndx = " << elf_sec->shndx << endl;
00076         }
00077 
00078         if ( checkFlag( memMap ) ) {
00079 
00080                 kout << "mmap_addr = " << hex << mbi->mmap_addr
00081                 << ", mmap_length = " << dec << mbi->mmap_length << endl;
00082 
00083                 for ( const char* curr = ( const char* )mbi->mmap_addr;
00084                         curr < ( const char* )mbi->mmap_addr + mbi->mmap_length ;
00085                         curr += (( const Memory_Map* )curr )->size + sizeof((( const Memory_Map* )curr )->size ) ) {
00086                         const Memory_Map* currEntry = reinterpret_cast<const Memory_Map*>( curr );
00087 
00088                         kout << " base_addr = " << hex << currEntry->base_addr_low;
00089                         if ( currEntry->length_low < 1024 )
00090                                 kout << ", length = " << dec << currEntry->length_low << "B";
00091                         else if ( currEntry->length_low < 1024*1024 )
00092                                 kout << ", length = " << dec << currEntry->length_low / 1024 << "kB";
00093                         else if ( currEntry->length_low < 1024*1024*1024 )
00094                                 kout << ", length = " << dec << currEntry->length_low / ( 1024*1024 ) << "MB";
00095                         else
00096                                 kout << ", length = " << dec << currEntry->length_low / ( 1024*1024*1024 ) << "GB";
00097 
00098                         kout << ", type = "
00099                         << (( currEntry->type == 0x1 ) ? "ram" : "reserved" ) << endl;
00100                 }
00101         }
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 void Task1::testKout()
00106 {
00107         int x, y;
00108         kout << endl << "Kout test:" << endl;
00109         kout.getpos( x, y );
00110         for ( unsigned int i = 0;i < 18;i++ ) {
00111                 if ( i % 6 == 0 ) {
00112                         kout.flush();
00113                         kout.setpos( 0, ( int )y + 1 + i / 6 );
00114                 }
00115                 kout << dec << "(" << i << ", " << hex << i << ") ";
00116         }
00117         kout << endl << endl << endl;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 void Task1::testKeyboard()
00122 {
00123         int x, y;
00124         kout << endl << "Keyboard test: ";
00125         kout.flush();
00126         kout.getpos( x, y );
00127 
00128         while ( true ) {
00129                 Key k = keyboard.key_hit();
00130                 if ( k.valid() ) {
00131                         kout.setpos( x, y );
00132                         kout << k.ascii();
00133                         kout.flush();
00134                 }
00135         }
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 void Task1::action()
00140 {
00141         kout.setpos( 36, 1 );
00142         kout << "OOStuBs" << endl;
00143 
00144         testKout();
00145 
00146         parseAndPrint();
00147 
00148         testKeyboard();
00149 }
